parameters.responseBody: ={   "success": true,   "message": "Kurset er nu oversat til {{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.target_language }}",   "title": "{{ $('Translate Course').first().json.output.title }}",   "course_id": "{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.course_id }}" }

parameters.query:
select t.module_id, t.title
from module_translations t join modules m
on t.module_id = m.id
where m.course_id = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.course_id }}'
and t.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.source_language }}'

select t.lesson_id, t.title
from lesson_translations t join lessons l
on t.lesson_id = l.id
where l.module_id =  '{{ $json.module_id }}'
and t.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}'

parameters.text:
=You are a professional course translator. Translate the provided course content from (ISO 639) language **{{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.source_language }}** to **{{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.target_language }}** following the guidelines below.

# Course Context
- **Course Structure:** **Course** -> Modules -> Lessons. We are now working in the top Course level.
- **Course Title:** {{ $json.data.title }}
- **Source Language (ISO 639) code:** {{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.source_language }}
- **Target Language (ISO 639) code::** {{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.target_language }}

# Instructions
1. Ensure a professional and educational tone throughout.
2. Keep technical terms in English when appropriate.
3. Preserve the markdown formatting and structure, especially for arrays, such as 'learning_objectives'.
4. Translate all module titles using the provided mappings. Apply these exact translations uniformly wherever the module title appears (e.g., content, videoscripts, descriptions).

# Tasks
**Task 1:**
Translate the following module titles and then use these module title translations everywhere throughout the course content. Preserve the module_id's unchanged:
{{ JSON.stringify($('ModuleOrgNames').item.json.data, null, 2) }}

**Task 2:**
Translate the course content provided below:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.data, null, 2) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT
  q.module_id,
  t.module_question_id,
  o.id AS module_question_option_id,
  (to_jsonb(q)  - 'id' - 'module_id')                          AS module_question,
  (to_jsonb(t)  - 'id' - 'module_question_id')                 AS module_question_translation,
  (to_jsonb(o)  - 'id' - 'module_question_id')                 AS module_question_option,
  (to_jsonb(ot) - 'id' - 'module_question_option_id')          AS module_question_option_translation
FROM module_questions q
LEFT JOIN module_question_translations t
  ON t.module_question_id = q.id AND t.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}'
LEFT JOIN module_question_options o
  ON o.module_question_id = q.id
LEFT JOIN module_question_option_translations ot
  ON ot.module_question_option_id = o.id AND ot.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}'
WHERE q.module_id = '{{ $('Edit Fields2').item.json.module_id }}'
  AND (t.module_question_id IS NOT NULL OR ot.module_question_option_id IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY q.position, o.position;

SELECT
  m.course_id,
  m.id                       AS module_id,
  m.position                 AS module_position,
  l.id                       AS lesson_id,
  l.position                 AS lesson_position,

  -- Engelsk kontekst
  mt_en.content              AS module_content_en,
  lt_en.title                AS lesson_title_en,

  -- Alle øvrige felter fra lesson_translations på dansk (ekskl. title)
  lt_da.lesson_id,
  lt_da.content,
  lt_da.video_url,
  lt_da.image_url,
  lt_da.videoscript,
  lt_da.exercises,
  lt_da.reflection_questions,
  lt_da.resources,
  lt_da.image_text,
  lt_da.image_prompt
FROM modules m
JOIN lessons l
  ON l.module_id = m.id
JOIN lesson_translations lt_da
  ON lt_da.lesson_id = l.id
 AND lt_da.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}'
LEFT JOIN lesson_translations lt_en
  ON lt_en.lesson_id = l.id
 AND lt_en.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.target_language }}'
LEFT JOIN module_translations mt_en
  ON mt_en.module_id = m.id
 AND mt_en.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.target_language }}'
WHERE m.course_id = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.course_id }}'
ORDER BY m.position, l.position;

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
	"title": "The Significance and Statistics of Occupational Health and Safety",
	"content": "## Introduktion\nVelkommen til denne første lektion, hvor vi sætter fokus på den helt grundlæggende årsag til, at vi beskæftiger os med arbejdsmiljøledelse",
	"exercises": "tatistik (globalt/Skandinavien)\n\n### Øvelse 1: Statistik-Spotting\n\n*Kort beskrivelse...",
	"reflection_questions": "## Reflektionsspørgsmål\n\n*   Lektionen præsenterer globale og skandinaviske statistikker om arbejdsmiljø. Hvilke af disse statistikker...",
	"resources": "### Yderligere ressourcer\n- **ILO og WHO's fælles estimater...",
	"image_text": "Asset Management handler om værdiskabelse..."
}

parameters.text:
=You are a professional course translator. Translate the provided course module **quiz and quiz options content** from (ISO 639) language **{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}* to **{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.target_language }}** following the guidelines below.

# Course Context
- **Course Structure:** Course -> **Modules** -> Lessons. We are now working in quiz and quiz options in one module.
- **Course Title:** {{ $('Translate Course').first().json.output.title }}
- **Source Language (ISO 639) code:** {{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}
- **Target Language (ISO 639) code:** {{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.target_language }}
- **Course Description:**
{{ $('Fetch Course Translation').first().json.description }}

-- **Content of this module:**
´´´
{{ $('Update Module Translation').item.json.content }}
´´´

# Instructions
1. Translate question_text and option_text in the Quiz-json
2. Ensure a professional and educational tone throughout.
3. Keep technical terms in English when appropriate.
4. Keep all other fields unchanged.
5. Pay especial attention to keep module_question_id and module_question_option_id unchanged because the workflow will fail if any of these keys are changed.




# Task 1: Translate question_text and option_text in the Quiz-json object:
{{ JSON.stringify($('AggQuizOrg').item.json.data, null, 2) }}

# Task 2: Ensure that all module_question_id and module_question_option_id are unchanged as the original UUID
